duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and execute projects using Agile delivery methodology, with total ownership and accountability.
Establish internal processes for successful project execution and manage business and vendor relationships.
Engage and influence stakeholders at all levels within the organization, promoting collaboration and teamwork.
Utilize MS Project, Word, Excel, Visio, PowerPoint, and business intelligence tools for project management.
Adapt to new tools and technologies as required for executing projects.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Project Management, or related field (Masters preferred)
